summary: A little squirrel with lots of charm accidentally helps two poor, down-but-NOT-out families overcome their obstacles.
cast: Jimmy Durante|Terry Moore|Tom Drake|Frank Orth|Sara Haden|Queenie Smith|Chick Chandler|Jimmy Conlin|Rupert|Hugh Sanders|Don Beddoe|Candy Candido|Clancy Cooper|Harold Goodwin|Frank Cady|Lester Dorr|Kenner G. Kemp|Frank Marlowe|Torben Meyer|Ralph Montgomery|Irving Pichel|Harry Strang
title: El gran Rupert
